name: Fine Brushwork: Bowl of Blossoms
description: A painting on sale at Xigu Antiques, this one features free brushstrokes that depict the charm of precious porcelain and flora in bloom most vividly.\nThe paintings of Liyue derive their colorful ink from the horsetails of Dihua Marsh. Others have attempted to copy this style, but were stymied by the quality of their pigments and eventually stopped trying.
